title: Burn 1 Billion IFT from total supply
body:
IFTip is a crypto currencies bot for million users all over the world.

IFT was issued by IFTip Team, hold IFT and you will get more rights and bonus from IF products. IFTip aim to connect you with infinite possibilities of blockchain. 

IFT's total supply is 2.1 Billion, In order to make IFT a more efficient DAO, Our dev team propose to burn 1 billion IFT. We think in this way, IFT holders will have more passion on promoting IFTip.

To vote, You should have some IFT (ERC20) on your metamask or other wallets. 1 IFT for 1 vote. We will perform the burning within 1 week after proposal passed.

Vote does not cost your Gas or IFT, just signature is required.

https://iftip.io
https://yuque.com/iftip
author: 0xcE4F1137d28B1Ed624ea966AC98Ae9C9e616c77f
